lead_paragraph: While Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger avoided sexual assault charges on Monday, many sportswriters say he should be punished swiftly by the N.F.L. for his lack of judgment.
snippet: While Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger avoided sexual assault charges on Monday, many sportswriters say he should be punished swiftly by the N.F.L. for his lack of judgment.
